mapper.select: select IncrID,ChangeID,HotelID,RoomTypeID,RateplanID,HotelCode,StartDate,EndDate,Status,Member,Weekend,MemberCost,WeekendCost,AddBed,ChangeTime,OperateTime,InsertTime,CurrencyCode,PriceID from IncrRate order by IncrID desc limit 0,1

select IncrID,ChangeID,HotelID,RoomTypeID,RateplanID,HotelCode,StartDate,EndDate,Status,Member,Weekend,MemberCost,WeekendCost,AddBed,ChangeTime,OperateTime,InsertTime,CurrencyCode,PriceID from IncrRate order by IncrID desc limit 0,1
